name: $wait
description: Delays the code below for x milliseconds

args.name: ms
args.description: The ms to wait for

name: $webhookCreate
description: Creates a webhook in a channel, returns the webhook id

args.name: channel ID
args.description: The channel to create the webhook

args.name: name
args.description: The webhook name

args.name: url
args.description: The avatar url

name: $webhookDelete
description: Deletes webhook with given id

args.name: id
args.description: The webhook id

name: $webhookEdit
description: Edits webhook with given id

args.name: id
args.description: The webhook id

args.name: name
args.description: The new name for the webhook

args.name: url
args.description: The new avatar for the webhook

name: $webhookExists
description: Checks whether given webhook id eixsts

args.name: id
args.description: The webhook id

name: $webhookSend
description: Sends a message with a webhook

args.name: url
args.description: The webhook url

args.name: content
args.description: The content for the message

args.name: return message ID
args.description: Return the message id of the sent message

name: $webhookToken
description: Gets webhook token of given id

args.name: id
args.description: The webhook id

name: $webhookURL
description: Gets webhook url with given id

args.name: id
args.description: The webhook id

name: $writeFile
description: Writes text to a file

args.name: path
args.description: The path to the file

args.name: text
args.description: The text to write

args.name: encoding
args.description: The encoding to use for text
